Text.Page:
First, they set up a big stone. Now they gather around it. Is it connected to all this death and mutation? I can't prove anything. Maybe you'll have better luck, eh?

Find proof that the {@LinkCreature:40#13#prion eviscerators} are involved in all this plague business and give it to {@LinkCreature:240#1004$$Lashirah}.

I know you'd do it anyway, but I'll reward you just the same.
Nicely done. This answers a lot of questions.
Have you found anything yet? Why not? Go find some {@LinkCreature:40#13#prion eviscerators}, kill them, and search their bodies.
